mapper.update: UPDATE terminals SET merchant_id = #{merchantId},billing_cycles_id = #{billingCyclesId} where id=#{terminalId}
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(t.id,'') as id,IFNULL(t.serial_num,'') as serial_num,IFNULL(t.status,'') as status,IFNULL(t.type,'') as type,IFNULL(b.`name`,'') as brandName, IFNULL(g.model_number,'') as model_number,IFNULL(o.id,'') as appid,IFNULL(o.`status`,'') as openstatus,IFNULL(c.`name`,'') as channelName ,IFNULL(t.pay_channel_id,'0') as payChannelId, IFNULL(c.opening_protocol,'') as openingProtocol FROM terminals t LEFT JOIN opening_applies o ON o.terminal_id = t.id LEFT JOIN goods g on t.good_id=g.id LEFT JOIN good_brands b on g.good_brands_id=b.id LEFT JOIN pay_channels c on c.id=t.pay_channel_id WHERE t.customer_id=#{id} AND t.status in (#{twoStatus},#{threeStatus}) ORDER BY t.created_at DESC,t.id DESC LIMIT #{offSetPage},#{pageSize}
SELECT count(*) FROM opening_requirements r WHERE r.pay_channel_id = #{payChannelId} and r.has_video_verify =#{hasVideoVerify}

SELECT t.serial_num,g.model_number,b.name as brandName,c.name as channelName,c.id as channelId,c.need_preliminary_verify as needPreliminaryVerify ,c.support_requirement_type as supportRequirementType FROM terminals t LEFT JOIN goods g on t.good_id=g.id LEFT JOIN good_brands b on g.good_brands_id=b.id LEFT JOIN pay_channels c on c.id=t.pay_channel_id WHERE t.id=#{terminalsId}
SELECT id,title FROM merchants where customer_id =#{customerId}

SELECT e.*,date_format(e.birthday,'%Y-%c-%d') as birthdays,p.`name` as channelname,b.`name` as billingname FROM opening_applies e LEFT JOIN pay_channels p on p.id = e.pay_channel_id LEFT JOIN dictionary_billing_cycles b ON b.id = e.billing_cyde_id WHERE terminal_id = #{terminalId}
SELECT * FROM merchants WHERE title = #{merchantName} or phone = #{phone}
SELECT d.id,d.`name` FROM pay_channels s LEFT JOIN pay_channel_billing_cycles p ON p.pay_channel_id = s.id LEFT JOIN dictionary_billing_cycles d ON d.id = p.billing_cycles_id WHERE s.id = #{id}

select dop.*, l.opening_requirements_id from dictionary_open_private_infos dop LEFT JOIN opening_requirement_lists l on dop.id=l.requirement_setting_id LEFT JOIN opening_requirements o ON o.id = l.opening_requirements_id left join terminals t on t.pay_channel_id = o.pay_channel_id where t.id=#{terminalsId} AND l.requirement_type=#{status} order by l.opening_requirements_id

select dop.*, l.opening_requirements_id from dictionary_open_private_infos dop LEFT JOIN opening_requirement_lists l on dop.id=l.requirement_setting_id LEFT JOIN opening_requirements o ON o.id = l.opening_requirements_id left join terminals t on t.pay_channel_id = o.pay_channel_id where t.id=#{terminalsId} AND l.requirement_type=#{status} order by l.opening_requirements_id
select o.* from terminals t LEFT JOIN opening_requirements o on t.pay_channel_id = o.pay_channel_id where t.id=#{terminalsId}
SELECT t.* FROM terminal_opening_infos t LEFT JOIN opening_applies e on t.opening_applies_id=e.id WHERE e.terminal_id = #{terminalsId}
SELECT id FROM opening_applies WHERE terminal_id=#{id}
